actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-442.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H. R. 6566, a bill to authorize appropriations for the use of the Energy Research and Development Administration in accordance with section 261 of the Atomic Energy Act of 1954, as amended, and section 305 of the Energy Reorganization Act of 1974.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 6566 (Appropriations authorization for Energy Research and Development Administration).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H. R. 6566, a bill to authorize appropriations for the use of the Energy Research and Development Administration in accordance with section 261 of the Atomic Energy Act of 1954, as amended, and section 305 of the Energy Reorganization Act of 1974.
